task.title: Permanently Repairing a Radiator Leak
task.shortdesc: Fix a radiator leak using solder for a permanent repair.

prereq.note: Ensure the radiator is cool and drained before attempting repair.

context.p: After a temporary repair or when discovering a small leak that requires permanent fixing.

step.cmd: Clean the area around the leak
Apply solder to seal the leak
Allow the solder to cool completely

result.p: The leak will be permanently sealed.
